name: Cassia
title: Amazon Warmatron
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Lightning Fury
abilities.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 damage to enemies in their path.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds. Passive: Cassia deals 20% increased damage to Blinded targets.

abilities.name: Fend
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.

heroics.name: Ball Lightning
heroics.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 damage to enemies hit.

heroics.name: Valkyrie
heroics.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

original.name: Cassia
original.title: Amazon Warmatron
original.description: After shattering the Worldstone, the young Amazon Cassia had changed. She had seen hatred, terror, and destruction firsthand. If the Askari were to survive the coming darkness, they needed an army. She would begin their training immediately.
original.shortDescription: An Assassin who specializes against Physical Attackers.

baseHeroInfo.name: Cassia
baseHeroInfo.title: Amazon Warmatron
baseHeroInfo.description: After shattering the Worldstone, the young Amazon Cassia had changed. She had seen hatred, terror, and destruction firsthand. If the Askari were to survive the coming darkness, they needed an army. She would begin their training immediately.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: An Assassin who specializes against Physical Attackers.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Avoidance
trait.description: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 65 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 65%.

skins.name: Amazon Warmatron
skins.description: After shattering the Worldstone, the young Amazon Cassia had changed. She had seen hatred, terror, and destruction firsthand. If the Askari were to survive the coming darkness, they needed an army. She would begin their training immediately.

skins.name: Warmatron Cassia
skins.description: After her victory against the Prime Evils, Cassia ascended through the ranks of the Askari to become their most legendary commander. The Warmatron’s battle armor is a gift from Queen Xaera herself.

skins.name: Pirate Queen Cassia
skins.description: From their secret hideout in Kraken’s Cove, Cassia’s fleet of ships unfurl their black sails on a mission to loot and plunder. Mistharbour will soon bow to a new pirate queen.
